author: Ali KC
title: Ali KC
text: i just fill up the form that is provided after filling form i just put my card numbers after clicking pay now 404 error appeared and money was taken by bravofly as it shown in bank statement but they saying the money is not taken by their system nothing else. i lost my money. they steal it and nothing i can do because the bank says you just fill the form yourself so its your responsibility
